contents:
手枪：Glock19 9mm
Concealed carry手枪：Glock 43 9mm

居家防卫: Remington 870
防卫+射击爱好：入门级AR15 Colt LE6920
以上四把枪一般情况下活得比枪主人还久

打猎 Winchester 70; Remington 700; Ruger American

情怀+收藏：Colt 1911 .45ACP; Czech AccuShadow 2; S&W .357 Revolver; Colt SAA; Colt Cobra; Colt Python; Desert Eagle 50 AE; Barret .50 BMG, etc.

推荐YouTube channel: hickok45
